question.questionText: If you are involved in a crash
question.answerText: pull off the driving lane if possible and turn of the ignition to prevent risk of fire
do what you can to make injured persons comfortable
call nearest law enforcement agency or 911 quickly if someone is injured or killed

question.questionText: If you are involved in a crash, and the crash results only in property damage
question.answerText: it is mandatory to inform law enforcement immediately
you should contact your auto insurance company, but it is not necessary to inform the property owner
you should inform the property owner immediately

question.questionText: Children younger than _______ of age should be secured in a child safety restraint system
Children under 8 years of age and under 4 feet 9 inches tall
question.answerText: must sit in a rear facing child restraint system
must sit in a forward facing booster seat used with both adult lap and shoulder belt
can sit in the front seat if the vehicle has air bags

question.questionText: In what situation can children be left unattended in a vehicle
question.answerText: only if the children are above 8 years of age
only if the children are safely fastened in a child safety restraint system

question.questionText: It is safe for children to ride in the cargo area of a truck or station wagon
When you are following a commercial vehicle at night
question.answerText: you should follow closely so that the commercial vehicle can see your vehicle
always change your headlight's to high beam so that the commercial vehicle can see it in its large side mirrors
always change your headlight's to low beam

question.questionText: Commercial vehicle 'no zone' area includes ____________ of the commercial vehicle
Passing a commercial vehicle takes _________ compared to a passenger vehicle on a level highway
When a commercial vehicle passes your vehicle, which one of these statements is False
question.answerText: keep to the far side of your lane

question.questionText: If you see orange construction signs and orange cones on an expressway, you must
question.answerText: slow down because the lane ahead ends
change the lane and maintain your speed
be prepared for workers and equipment ahead

question.questionText: Orange road sign
question.answerText: warns and controls in construction zones
warns and controls in pedestrian crossings

question.questionText: In highway work-zone areas
question.answerText: watch out for workers and equipment
if flag person is present, then follow flag person's directions

question.questionText: This road sign means:
question.answerText: workers are performing maintenance on the roadway

question.questionText: It is legal to block a crosswalk if it is unmarked
If a blind pedestrian is waiting at a crosswalk with a white cane or a guide dog, you must
question.answerText: use your horn to alert them of your presence
reduce your speed and proceed slowly
not use your horn or rev your engine
increase your speed and move quickly

question.questionText: The only way to reduce the concentration of alcohol in your body is by
True or False? A person with higher percentage of fat than another person with the same body weight will reach higher alcohol concentration by consuming the same amount of alcohol
Consuming alcohol acts a
Drivers who consume alcohol
A person with blood alcohol concentration of ____ or higher in control of a moving or parked vehicle can be arrested for DWI
It is lawful to allow a passenger sitting in the back seat of the vehicle to have an open container of an alcoholic beverage
If an emergency vehicle approaching you is separated from your lane of traffic by a physical barrier such as a fence, wall, or a median then
question.answerText: you must slow down your vehicle
you must pull to the right and stop
you must pull to whichever side is the nearest and stop
you do not have to stop

question.questionText: When you see an emergency vehicle with lights flashing and siren activated behind you
question.answerText: slam on the brake pedal and stop
swerve into the other lane if possible to let the vehicle pass
use your turn signal and move to the nearest side of the road and then stop

question.questionText: Your headlight's must be turned on and used
question.answerText: at sunset and used until sun rise
only when there are no street lights
15 minutes before sunset and 15 minutes after sunrise

question.questionText: Headlight's must be turned on any time you cannot clearly see the road ahead for a distance of at least ________
Your headlight's must be set to low beam when you are within _________ of an on-coming vehicle
When you are following another vehicle at a distance of 200 feet or less, then your headlight's must be set on ________
If your headlight's suddenly go out (stop working) what will you do that will give you enough light to guide you to drive off the road?
When set on high beam the headlight's must make objects visible on the road ahead from at least ________ away
When two vehicles approach an uncontrolled 'T' intersection the driver of the vehicle turning _________ must yield to cross traffic
When two vehicles reach an intersection at the same time, and there is no traffic light or signal, then the driver of
question.answerText: the vehicle on the right must yield to the vehicle on the left
the vehicle who signals first has the right-of-way
the vehicle on the left must yield to the vehicle on the right

question.questionText: In an uncontrolled 'T' intersection which one of these has the right-of-way over over all other
If there is an emergency vehicle with flashing lights behind you while you are in an intersection
question.answerText: move to the left lane and stop
move to the right lane and stop
cross the intersection, proceed to the right lane, and stop as soon as you can

question.questionText: You may legally block an intersection
question.answerText: when you entered an intersection on a green light
when there is heavy traffic during peak hours
when the traffic signal shows a flashing yellow

question.questionText: This road sign means:
"No turn on Red" is posted at an intersection. Which one of these statement is True?
question.answerText: school bus turning right MUST stop while making a right turn
large commercial vehicles turning right MUST stop while making a right turn
all vehicles turning right MUST stop while making a right turn

question.questionText: This road sign means:
question.answerText: crossroad - a four way intersection ahead

question.questionText: This sign means:
A solid yellow line next to a broken yellow line means that
question.answerText: vehicles in both direction may pass
only the vehicle next to solid line may pass
only the vehicle next to broken yellow line may pass

question.questionText: Double solid white lines
question.answerText: indicate that lane change is prohibited in areas where this type of marking is present
indicate that lane change is allowed
separates lanes of traffic in opposite direction

question.questionText: A line composed of yellow dashes separating a two-lane road with traffic moving in both direction indicates
A center lane between lanes of traffic in opposite direction
question.answerText: serves as a median separating flow of traffic in opposite direction
serves as a passing lane if it is safe to do so
may be designated for left turns only

question.questionText: Pavement markings consisting of shorter and thicker white lines indidate
question.answerText: that lane changes are not allowed

question.questionText: If you're driving on an Interstate (freeway) and a car is attempting to merge into your lane, you should
question.answerText: if possible, safely make room for the merging vehicle
continue to drive at constant speed as you have right-of-way

question.questionText: This sign means:
If you miss your exit on a freeway
question.answerText: back up if it safe to do so
you may make a U-turn if it safe to do so

question.questionText: _____ ______ are short, one-way roads that provide access to freeways.
Parking your vehicle is not allowed
Parking your vehicle is not allowed
You may not legally park your vehicle within 50 feet of a railroad crossing
When a vehicle is properly parallel parked, its wheels on the curb side should be positioned no more than _________ from the curb
True or False? Parking is allowed at the street end of a driveway
When the front of a parked vehicle points uphill and there is no curb, the wheels should
question.answerText: point towards the shoulder of the road away from the traffic
point away from the shoulder of the road towards the traffic

question.questionText: Parking is illegal along the yellow curb
Parking is not allowed within _______ of STOP sign
Parking is not allowed within _______ of a fire hydrant
If you leave your vehicle unoccupied on a public road
question.answerText: turn the front wheels away from the curb or the shoulder of the road
turn the front wheels towards from the curb or the shoulder of the road and engage the parking brake
wheels should be parallel to the curb or the shoulder

question.questionText: While passing a bicyclist, there should be at least _______ between the side of your car and the bicylist
When passing another vehicle, you must return to the
question.answerText: right side of the road before coming within 200 feet of an oncoming vehicle
left side of the road before coming within 200 feet of an oncoming vehicle
right side of the road before coming within 100 feet of an oncoming vehicle
left side of the road before coming within 100 feet of an oncoming vehicle

question.questionText: This sign means:
This road sign means:
question.answerText: marks the beginning of no passing zone
marks the end of no passing zone

question.questionText: It is illegal to pass another vehicle that has stopped for a pedestrian
It is illegal to overtake and pass on the right of another vehicle
question.answerText: if there is sufficient width for two or more lanes of traffic moving in the same direction and the roadway is free from obstructions such as parked vehicles
by driving on the shoulder if the shoulder is unpaved
when the vehicle overtaken is making or about to make a left turn

question.questionText: This sign means:
It is legal to drive in the bicycle lane
question.answerText: while entering or exiting the road
when there is no bicyclist using the bicycle lane

question.questionText: True or False? Bicyclist riding on urban roads that do not have dedicated bicycle lanes share the same rights and responsibilties as other vehicles
It is illegal to pass any vehicle within ________ of a rail road crossing
This sign means:
At railroad crossing when the lights or gates are activated, you must stop _______ from the nearest rail or gate
At railroad crossing, if your vehicle has manual transmission
question.answerText: do not shift gears while your vehicle is within a crossing
shift down the gear after entering the railroad crossing

question.questionText: A school bus is stopped with its red lights flashing and its stop arm extended, you must stop your vehicle at least _______ from the school bus
At what time are you allowed to pass a school bus?
question.answerText: if the school bus is not in motion and the red lights are flashing
if the school bus is in motion

question.questionText: Passengers sitting in the back seat are not required to wear seat belts
The lap seat belt should be positioned
question.answerText: across your abdomen or soft part of your stomach
across you hipbones or upper thighs

question.questionText: You are not legally required to wear a seat belt if you are
question.answerText: driving a pickup truck while engaged in farm work
riding in the back seat of the vehicle

question.questionText: Which one of these statment's is TRUE about seat belts?
question.answerText: if you are driving below or at 12 mph you do not need seat belts
seat belt is not required by occupants sitting on the back seat
your chances of surviving a car crash is more if you use the lap and shoulder belts together

question.questionText: True or False? Airbags are designed to keep the occupants from being ejected
Keep your hands on the _____________ positions on the steering wheel
The distance between the driver and the steering should be at least _________
Which one of the statements is False while driving during winter?
question.answerText: use cruise control to maintain traction
use headlight's when it is snowing or sleeting
increase safe stopping distance between vehicles

question.questionText: In winter, you should keep a distance of at least ____________ while driving behind snowplows
While driving behind a snowplow vehicle, drive close to the slowplow to avoid "whiteout" conditions
If your vehicle begins to hydroplane
question.answerText: take the foot of the gas pedal
gently pump your your brake pedal
apply more pressure to the gas pedal so as to increase the speed

question.questionText: If you encounter thunderstorms
question.answerText: keep your headlight's on high beam to reduce glare
keep your headlight's on low beam to reduce glare

question.questionText: While changing lanes or making a turn, you must signal at least _________ in advance
When should you use you car signals
question.answerText: while moving from a parking lane or the curb

question.questionText: While changing lanes or making a turn, you must signal at least _________ in advance
When should you use you car signals
question.answerText: while moving from a parking lane or the curb

question.questionText: Under ideal driving conditions, unless traffic signs indicate otherwise, the speed limit in alleys should be
In urban or town roads under ideal driving conditions the speed limit is ______
A Neighborhood Electric Vehicle (NEV) can be driven
question.answerText: only on streets with speed limit 25 mph of less
only on streets with speed limit 35 mph or less
only on streets with speed limit 45 mph of less

question.questionText: Under ideal driving conditions, driving faster than the posted speed limit is
question.answerText: legal if your speed is within +10 mph over the posted speed limit
legal if the other traffic is driving faster than the posted speed limit
legal if there is no other vehicle in your lane ahead of your vehicle

question.questionText: This road sign means under ideal driving conditions:
When you are merging on to the freeway, you should be driving
question.answerText: at or near the same speed as the traffic on the freeway
5 or 10 miles slower than the traffic on the freeway

question.questionText: If a traffic signal is not functioning (blacked out)
question.answerText: slow down and proceed through the intersection with caution
treat it as a STOP sign

question.questionText: One car per green light
question.answerText: is used while turning left on solid green light
is used on freeway ramp meters

question.questionText: A flashing red light traffic signal means
question.answerText: slow down and drive with caution
come to a complete stop and treat it like a STOP sign

question.questionText: A flashing yellow light or yellow arrow means
question.answerText: slow down and proceed through the intersection with caution
yield right of way to vehicles and pedestrian already in the intersection
come to a complete stop and treat it like a STOP sign

question.questionText: Which of the following traffic lights must you always stop your vehicle
question.answerText: solid red lights, flashing yellow lights
solid red lights, flashing red lights, blacked-out traffic signals
solid red lights, red arrow, yellow lights

question.questionText: A steady yellow light or arrow indiates
question.answerText: caution the light is about to turn "green"
caution the light is about to turn "red"

question.questionText: A steady red X signal means
question.answerText: means you should prepare to move into another lane in a safe manner
you cannot drive in the lane under the steady red X signal
freeway lane below the steady downward red arrow will be closed

question.questionText: A steady downward green arrow traffic signal means
question.answerText: you can turn in any direction
you are allowed to drive in the lane below the green arrow

question.questionText: While waiting to turn
question.answerText: keep your wheels straight and your foot on the brake
point your wheels in the direction you intend to turn

question.questionText: If you are in a left turn lane of a multi-lane road, while turning left onto another multi-lane roadway
question.answerText: if it is safe to do so you can change lanes during the turn
stay in your lane during the turn

question.questionText: On an interstate freeway U-turns are
Before you make a left turn, you must signal continuously during the last ______ before the turn
U-turns are illegal on curves where other drivers cannot see you from _________ away
This road sign means:
question.answerText: yield ONLY to all other vehicles
yield to all other pedestrians and vehicles

question.questionText: You can avoid dangerous last minute maneuvers by looking __________ ahead of your vehicle at all times
Which one of the following statements is True about blind spots
question.answerText: blind spots can be eliminated when you use your 2 outside mirrors
tractors, trailers, and large vehicles have larger blind spots than most passenger vehicles
proper use of all 3 mirrors will eliminate your blind spot
blind spot applies ONLY to trucks and not for smaller vehicles

question.questionText: Road signs in Red color indicate
Driving in Minnesota is
question.answerText: the right of every US citizen
the right of every Minnesota resident

question.questionText: Which one of these statements is True about roundabouts?
question.answerText: do not stop, pass, or change lanes within a roundabout
are designed to increase the traffic flow
slow down as you approach the roundabout

question.questionText: If transit or Metro mobility bus is attempting to merge from a bus stop or from a shoulder, drivers in the right lane of traffic
Before entering a road from a private driveway and there is no STOP sign
question.answerText: stop only if there is a STOP sign
slow down and look in right and then left direction
you have the right of way

question.questionText: Which one of these statements should you obey over all other?
question.answerText: obey the hand signals you are given by the law enforcement officer

question.questionText: Running out of fuel on a freeway is considered as an emergency
Which one of these can use high occupancy vehicle lanes
question.answerText: vehicles carrying two or more people

question.questionText: Backing up is not allowed on freeways or expressway, except by
If you are driving at a slower speed than other traffic on road with two or more lanes in the same direction of the traffic, you must stay in the lane
question.answerText: nearest to the center of the road
nearest to the shoulder of the road
nearest to the left side of the road
farthest from the right side of the road

question.questionText: If you are pulling a camper or trailer with your vehicle, you must maintain at least _______ following distance from other vehicles
An __________ is the connection of a freeway to a road or another freeway by a series of ramps
When making a right turn you should turn the steering wheel using
Anyone who flees a police officer using a motor vehicle is sentenced to imprisonment for not more than
A three second rule is a way
question.answerText: to safely merge from a ramp
is a way to help keep a safe distance between you car and the vehicle ahead of you

question.questionText: If you notice fire beneath the hood of your vehicle, DO NOT
question.answerText: use water to put out the fire

question.questionText: This sign means:
A class D drivers license allows you to tow a trailer or any other vehicle, if the combined gross weight of the vechile and the trailer is
If your vehicle skids
question.answerText: take the foot of the accelerator and brakes

question.questionText: To maintain alertness and concentration during long drives, which one of these statements is false
question.answerText: stop at least once every 100 miles or every 2 hours
take over the counter "stay awake" drugs
if the weather permits open a window slightly to increase the fresh air flow

question.questionText: Which one of these distracted driving behaviors is also considered illegal on Minnesota roads?
question.answerText: using the cell phone for accessing the internet
talking to other passengers on the back seat

question.questionText: On a freeway if a vehicle behind you is following too closely
question.answerText: slow down slightly and allow it to pass
accelerate so that the vehicle following you does not tail gate

question.questionText: Which one of these lights cannot be used by unauthorized vehicles
It is illegal to drive a vehicle with a tire having a tire depth of less than ____ of an inch
"Zipper merge" is a driving strategy to _____ _____ when you have recognized that the lane will end soon
A load must not stick out ______ in front of the front wheels or bumper of a vehicle
A recreational vehicle combination should not be more than _______
If a load extends 4 feet or more from the rear of the vehicle
question.answerText: it is illegal under all circumstances
a red, orange, or yellow flag at least a 16 inches square must be attached to the end of the load
it does not have to be legally marked but it is advisable to do so

question.questionText: GPS or Navigation Devices may be mounted or positioned near the
question.answerText: top right portion of the windshield

question.questionText: True or False? If there is sufficient room, it is safe to drive a vehicle alongside a motorcycle in the same lane
This sign means:
This road sign means:
question.answerText: keep to the right of traffic island or median

question.questionText: Brown road signs
question.answerText: warns and controls in construction zones
indicates historic, cultural, or recreation sites

question.questionText: This sign means:
This sign means:
This sign means:
question.answerText: you are leaving a one way traffic road and entering a two way traffic road

question.questionText: This sign means:
This road sign means:
This road sign means:
This road sign means:
This sign means:
This sign means:
This sign means:
This sign means:
This road sign means:
This road sign means:
This road sign means:
question.answerText: additional right lane of traffic begins

question.questionText: Blue road signs are
This road sign means:
You should obey the instructions from the guards in the school zone
This road sign means:
This road sign means:
question.answerText: do not enter that lane or road if the sign is facing you
